thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Herald Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Sightseeing, theatre, opera, Metropolitan museum
thread.title_full: Sightseeing, theatre, opera, Metropolitan museum - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Herald Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Gary P
title: Sightseeing, theatre, opera, Metropolitan museum
text:
Excellent, central location. CLOSE to subway, Penn station,Macy's. A good walk to Central Park, an easier walk to theatres. The hotel is small but we'll fitted out. Virtually a new hotel. The room was small, but we were not entertaining.
Bed was very comfortable, excellent WiFi reception.
Workout room small, but useful. The bar is comfortable (too cold for the patio), full at happy hour.
Complementary breakfast was very good, a mix of hot and cold.
If the room had been larger I would have given 5 stars. We will stay here again. My wife loved the location. Lots of restaurants close by.
